model
Class ComputerPlayer

java.lang.Object
  model.Player
      model.ComputerPlayer

public class ComputerPlayer
extends Player

A computer player in the game of Tron. This computer is controlled by the strategy specified. It is possible to change the strategy mid way.

Version:
1.1 (17-01-2011)
Author:
Daniel Hessellund Egeberg, Søren Dahlgaard, Martin Nicklas Jørgensen

Constructor Summary
ComputerPlayer(Color color, String name, IStrategy strategy)
          Constructs a new computer player with the specified strategy, name and color
 
Method Summary
 Direction nextMove(Game game)
          The direction of the next move this player wants to do.

                      String name,
                      IStrategy strategy)
Constructs a new computer player with the specified strategy, name and color

color - The color of the player

Method Detail

nextMove

public Direction nextMove(Game game)
The direction of the next move this player wants to do. This method does not perform the move, but only informs the game that the player wants to do this move.

Specified by:
nextMove in class Player
Parameters:
game - The state of the game.
Returns:
The direction of the wished move.
